ygData.subject: RE: Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: The servers are down (according to EQVault and everquest s network status page).  No news on the patch message though.
ygData.messageBody:
The servers are down (according to EQVault and everquest's network status
page). No news on the patch message though.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Peck White [SMTP:PWhite@...]
> Sent: Thursday, February 17, 2000 1:45 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Patch
>
> From: Peck White <PWhite@...>
>
> Did the patch go in this morning? I'm at work so I can't check.
>
> Tomerrilin
